about_the_game:
FEATURES
  • Singleplayer ThirdPersonShooter with HIGH quality graphics made in Unreal Engine 5
  • Missions and progress with ranks and kills | Unique original repair system
  • Full Xbox GAMEPAD support with rumble FX's and more
  • Full display gamepad and audio settings to control
  • 4 weapons to buy with gold. Find chests and open them with 02 tank
  • 4 difficulty Levels to play ( COWARD - SOLDIER - ANGEL - RAGE )
  • Original inmersive FX audio and music with a rich history

REDCALL is an INDIE single-player third-person shooter game with full Xbox controller gamepad support and constant action gameplay, unique RANK and MISSIONs system, hordes with rounds system of undead, monsters and cyborgs with firepower. Campaign system with 4 difficulty levels and 6 maps to explore, collect gold by extracting tanks and locating them on hidden chests, buy weapons and survive the hordes of hell

DISCLAMER! READ BEFORE BUY

Before making your purchase, be aware that this video game was created by a single person in the universe of what are called independent video game developers, so certain glitches or bugs may be detected which will not affect the quality of the gameplay and in general If detected in time, the corresponding updates will be made. Please keep these terms in mind before purchasing. Thank you for your understanding


It’s 2030. The evolution of artificial intelligence grew exponentially since its creation until today, so much so that humanity decided to leave government decisions, laws, management of the financial system, and the definitive replacement of human politicians to AI. A dimensional portal opened by the use of an atom collider with an advance A.I called "NASE", a direct gate to hell make this evil and takes control of population by getting them more affraid, hopeless and keeping the portal open bringing monsters, undead and more calamities. This anomaly in the balance of the cosmos released evil spirits made flesh to stalk and hunt the survivors. NASE deploy cyborgs with ammo firing capacity

The portal’s opening brought incarnate evil, which soon took control of NASE to control the population, spreading fear and chaos. The cruel plan kept the civilian population in a state of deception, where the AI acted as their benefactor, instructing survivors to stay indoors, avoid social relationships, and not venture outside to avoid being devoured or mutilated by the beings from this dimension of evil. Among the beings that began to inhabit the earth, the most dangerous are called “the Damned.” These were evil men/woman during their time on earth, taken to hell by having their heads cut off while their bodies were tortured for eternity. Now, they walk the streets seeking bodies to infect, as their flesh is rotten and full of lethal diseases, especially in their fingernails. They are part of the army of evil under NASE’s command.



A group of human rebels organized in the last bastion of humanity in the south of the world. They formed an operational unit called “REDCALL,” dedicated to closing the portal and disconnecting NASE. With collaboration from survivors worldwide, they formed a crisis committee to study AI techniques for controlling the population and maintaining its energy. After many soldiers sacrificed themselves, they discovered six places with atomic power sources that supply NASE with the energy to function and keep the portal open. These cores can be hacked using a wireless welding system developed by REDCALL’s technology sector, causing atomic explosions on the NASE nodes. Intelligence suggests there may be a seventh point, but its location is unknown. It was also proven that NASE responds violently to any mobilization of soldiers, causing over 60% casualties. Thus, the best strategy is a single infiltrator to generate fractures in these power sources and destroy NASE, closing the portal forever and freeing humanity.



Human technological advances have not gone unnoticed by NASE. An exoskeleton has been developed for soldiers' suits, equipped with brain chips, sensors, an air impulse roll system, high-tech weapons, and unprecedented damage capacity. These super soldiers can face the threat, but arms dealers demand gold for new weapons, as they control the factories guarded by independent AI machines that self-destruct if tampered with. Soldiers can find "treasure suitcases" hidden in the landscapes containing valuable resources.

Are you willing to fight?

short_description: TPS singleplayer dystopic game with full Xbox controller support and nonstop action. Round-based gameplay with undead, monsters and cyborgs with firepower. Four difficulty levels, explore 6 maps, gather gold, buy weapons and survive hordes while repairing power sources to close the portal to hell
